players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
You: "Wow, I didn't expect Bob to be the first one to go. This is definitely suspicious. We need to work together to figure out who could be behind this."
You: "Charlie seems suspiciously eager to point fingers. We should consider all possibilities and not rush to conclusions."

Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we all share any information or suspicions we may have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. We need to work together and keep an open mind in order to solve this mystery."

Diana: "I believe it's important that we all share any information or suspicions we may have, as Charlie suggested. Based on the evidence we have so far, I think Alice's behavior is suspicious and warrants further investigation."
